casebody.data:
SEA RANCH OWNERS ASSO.
v.
SEA RANCH. No. 338P06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 13, 2006. Alyssa M. Chen, William S. Hoyle, for Sea Ranch Owners Asso. Steven C. Frucci, Virginia Beach, VA, Bradford J. Lingg, E. Crouse Gray, Kill Devil Hills, for Sea Ranch II, Inc.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 12th day of December 2006 by Plaintiff to Amend Record on Appeal:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 13th day of December 2006."
